item.title: Making Bandos Armor in CzarScape?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“Fink-Fast, post:7, topic:166284”]If your using the project czar source, with silabsoft.

go here to find the silabsoft ID’s

http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/output.txt

And find bandos …

And go into item.cfg and before “[ENDOFITEMLIST]”

Add this.

item = [ITEMID]	[ITEMNAME]		[DESCRIPTION]			[AMOUNT]            [AMOUNT]	[AMOUNT]	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	35	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0

Then add the ID to a shop …

Enjoy :)[/quote]Look at what hes saying very carfully…I think he knows id if hes trying he says.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Bandos Armor in CzarScape?
item.dc:creator: @Fink-Fast Fink-Fast
item.description:
@Fink-Fast wrote:

If your using the project czar source, with silabsoft.

go here to find the silabsoft ID’s

http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/output.txt

And find bandos …

And go into item.cfg and before “[ENDOFITEMLIST]”

Add this.

item = [ITEMID]	[ITEMNAME]		[DESCRIPTION]			[AMOUNT]            [AMOUNT]	[AMOUNT]	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	35	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0

Then add the ID to a shop …

Enjoy

Read full topic
